caption.p: Depiction of percent of time (a) and rate (b) of using each enrichment item throughout the study (mean ± SE; n = 4). Significant pairwise comparisons (p < 0.05) within each enrichment item are noted on the graph with different letters, using uppercase letters for percent of time and lowercase letters for rate per 20 min. Pairwise comparisons between enrichment items are not shown. Pairwise comparisons can be found in Table S9.
